title: New Year’s Never Ends!
detail_text: <:th_ch0208/>Thanks for waiting, Umi-chan~. I made a simple lunch, would you like to eat it?<:dt_line_end/><:th_ch0004/>Thank you, Emma. But, you call this simple....? It looks very elaborate to me....<:dt_line_end/><:th_ch0208/>It is simple~. I just rearranged some new year’s leftovers.<:dt_line_end/><:th_ch0004/>Eeeh!? These were all made from leftovers!?<:dt_line_end/><:th_ch0208/>I made a sandwich out of sweet omelet rolls. This one was just salad and tuna with some mayonnaise. Simple, right?<:dt_line_end/><:th_ch0004/>Well, when you put it that way, yes. But it’s still amazing how you came up with the idea.<:dt_line_end/><:th_ch0208/>Ahaha, I was just lucky it worked out. Besides, it’s even more amazing how new year’s dishes can still taste delicious after being repurposed~. I can always enjoy them! Come on, try it.<:dt_line_end/><:th_ch0004/>Okay, thanks for the food. *Munch*....! It’s delicious!<:dt_line_end/><:th_ch0208/>Fufu. We have black soybean pudding for dessert!<:dt_line_end/><:th_ch0004/>I thought I was tired of eating new year’s dishes, but you’re right, Emma. I can eat these forever~!<:dt_line_end/><:th_ch0000/>Translated by SIFAStheatre and Idol Story<:dt_line_end/>
